title: Cleansing Herb Tea
description: Clear out blockages with this signature Cleansing herb tea which uses the cleansing power of herbs to stimulate natural weight loss.
cleaned_text: Our Cleansing Tea is a pleasant and soothing drink with a mild laxative effect. This tea contains Senna, which is the leaf of Cassia senna. Leaves of the plant have been used for many years as a stimulant laxative. *No caffeine* - Helps keep your body excretory system working efficiently - Helps flush dried fecal matter out of colon (avg person carries around 10 lbs.) - May assist weight loss- Helps stimulate intestinal contractions - Helps to increase fluids and electrolytes in the colon, which softens stools - Helps eliminate toxins and undigested food in the large intestine by cleaning and detoxification of the bowels, which may help support nutrient absorption from incoming "new" foodsInstructions: 1 bag, 2-3 times a week, steep 3-5 minutes. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
